basics.name: Jeff Balagosa
basics.summary: Experienced Desktop Support Manager with 18+ years of technical leadership and management skills. Seeking transition to Web Development. Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Python, with a strong understanding of operating systems and network architecture. Skilled in project management and cross-functional collaboration. Passionate about learning new technologies and frameworks.
basics.headline: Professional Technology Expert

items.name: Vegas.com
items.summary:
- Developed custom tools to automate tasks and improve efficiency, leveraging programming languages such as JavaScript, Python, PowerShell, AutoHotkey, and Ansible.
- Managed a desktop support team, motivating them to complete assigned tasks before deadlines.
- Implemented and deployed endpoint management systems to ensure the smooth operation of company workstations.
- Reviewed and provided technical support for team tickets and phone calls.
- Conducted research, ordered, and deployed new hardware and software for desktop systems, printers, scanners, and other peripherals.
- Maintained security updates for company workstations and non-production servers while ensuring that computing standards met PCI requirements for audits.

items.name: Vegas.com
items.summary:
- Supervised a technical support team, ensuring timely resolution of user issues.
- Deployed and managed endpoint management systems to optimize workstation performance.
- Conducted regular reviews of technician tickets and phone calls to identify areas for improvement.
- Researched and recommended new hardware and software for company workstations and peripherals.
- Ensured timely implementation of security updates for company workstations and non-production servers.
- Maintained computing standards following PCI requirements to support successful audits.

items.name: Vegas.com
items.summary:
- Conducted troubleshooting on hardware and software systems to identify and resolve issues quickly.
- Managed the deployment and replacement of hardware and software systems at corporate offices, hotels, and casinos.
- Administered user accounts within Active Directory and Microsoft Exchange, ensuring proper access and security.
- Researched and recommended new equipment and software, including desktop systems, printers, scanners, monitors, and other peripherals.
- Ensured regular updates and backups of servers in a primarily Windows Server 2008 environment.
- Installed, updated, and maintained server-based software to support efficient system performance.
- Provisioned and deployed smartphones, including Blackberry, iPhone, and Android devices, for company use.

items.name: The Madrid Agency of Farmers Insurance
items.summary:
- Amplified our team with expert hiring and training.
- Dominated the local market with targeted lead generation for businesses and households.
- Drove results through effective telemarketing campaigns.
- Built valuable relationships with centers of influence.
- Captured attention with compelling ad copy and strategic direct mail.
- Secured appointments with qualified prospects through professional 3rd party services.
- Delivered exceptional customer service and fostered loyalty.
- Achieved consistent growth with 20 new business policies closed monthly.

items.name: Vegas.com
items.summary:
- Performed second level troubleshooting on hardware & software systems problems.
- Deployed and replaced various hardware and software systems in the corporate offices as well as hotels and casinos.
- Created, managed, and deleted user accounts within Active Directory and Microsoft Exchange.
- Researched, ordered, and deployed new equipment and software. Desktop systems, printers, scanners, monitors, peripherals, etc.
- Update and back up servers as needed. Primarily in a Windows Server 2008 environment.
- Installed, updated, and maintained server-based software.
- Provisioned and deployed smartphones, such as Blackberry, iPhone, and Android.
- Assisted in training new Desktop Support Technicians.

items.name: Vegas.com
items.summary:
- Performed first-level core troubleshooting on hardware & software systems problems.
- Answered questions, provided technical solutions, and followed up to assist users in solving their information systems problems in a continuous user-support environment.
- Documented user problems, resolution, and new solutions for future reference using helpdesk tools and resources, such as Frontrange and our own Proprietary Helpdesk Wiki.
- Assisted in identifying continuing hardware, software, or systems problems trends.
- Coordinated with other departments such as Systems Engineering, Network Engineering, and Production Support to resolve companywide emergency issues in a 24hr environment.
- Managed user accounts with Active Directory.
- Assisted in training new Helpdesk Technicians.

- Elevated my Python programming proficiency through rigorous training modules and hands-on coding challenges.
- Honed problem-solving skills in software development, demonstrating the ability to troubleshoot and optimize code.
- Achieved a perfect score on the first full-stack application project, a project management tool built using Django, CSS, and JavaScript; included a dark mode feature for enhanced user experience.
- Scored 98% on the first comprehensive exam, underscoring a strong grasp of software engineering fundamentals.

- Earned a Bachelor's in Technical Management from DeVry University, providing a solid foundation in project management, operations, and team leadership.
- Acquired business analytics and strategy formulation skills, enabling effective problem-solving in technical environments.
- Developed interdisciplinary knowledge that bridges the gap between technology and management, enhancing the ability to lead tech-driven projects effectively.

Awarded an Associate's in Computer Science from Education America, laying the groundwork for a technology and software development career.
Gained early exposure to programming languages, notably C++, providing an initial skill set for subsequent technical roles and educational pursuits.
Acquired fundamental knowledge in algorithms, data structures, and software engineering concepts, offering a long-term basis for skills in technical problem-solving.

items.name: Brazilian Jiu Jitsu Blackbelt and Instructor
